ranked_differential_diagnosis.label: Nonorganic hearing loss
ranked_differential_diagnosis.rationale_short: Initial responses were inconsistent and elevated but normalized immediately after reinstruction and use of an ascending method; physiological tests (reflexes) were normal.

ranked_differential_diagnosis.label: Normal hearing
ranked_differential_diagnosis.rationale_short: Final pure-tone thresholds and speech recognition scores were within normal limits bilaterally.

ordered_list.rationale_short: To assess hearing sensitivity and configuration.
To assess speech reception thresholds and word recognition abilities.
To assess the acoustic reflex arc and check for retrocochlear pathology.

expected_interpretations_by_visit.collective_interpretation: The evaluation revealed normal hearing sensitivity bilaterally with excellent speech recognition abilities. Middle ear function was normal. Although initial responses in the right ear were inconsistent and suggestive of hearing loss, reinstruction resulted in reliable thresholds within normal limits, indicating a nonorganic component to the initial presentation.

tests.name: Pure-tone audiometry
tests.result_summary: Normal hearing sensitivity (0-10 dB HL) bilaterally. Initial right ear responses were inconsistent and elevated but normalized after reinstruction.

tests.name: Speech audiometry
tests.result_summary: SRTs (Right 5 dB HL, Left 0 dB HL) were in agreement with PTA. WRS were excellent (92%) bilaterally.

tests.name: Acoustic reflexes
tests.result_summary: Reflexes present and normal for ipsilateral and contralateral stimulation at 500, 1000, 2000, and 4000 Hz. Reflex decay was negative.

proposed_items: Obtain previous hearing test for comparison
Monitor hearing sensitivity with a re-evaluation in 6 months
counseling_actions: Inform the patient and family that hearing sensitivity is normal in both ears
Explain that initial inconsistencies resolved after clarification of instructions
Discuss the recommendation for monitoring due to family concerns

escalation.rationale_short: Referral to evaluate the intermittent pain reported in the left ear.

follow_up_plan.objective: To monitor hearing sensitivity due to family concerns and patient observations.
